Teal'c is 107 years old; a member of a genetically-altered human subspecies, the Jaffa. He has murdered countless innocents. He has a marsupial-like pouch in his abdomen, for incubating alien parasites. But he cannot keep his shit together while a woman talks about her vagina. https://t.co/zbtCLlo9CK

He got the ticket from this man, Jacek, an alien con man and father to Teal'c's teammate Vala Mal Doran. He believed the show to be called The Virginia Dialogues, having limited knowledge of culture on Earth due to his recent arrival. https://t.co/76tcl4qg4f
